In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdetermine[0m [93mcryo[0m-[93mEM[0m [93mstructures[0m of [93msuccinate[0m [93mdehydrogenase[0m ([93mSDH[0m) from [93mChloroflexus[0m [93maurantiacus[0m ([93mCaSDH[0m), a [93mfacultative[0m [93mfilamentous[0m [93manoxygenic[0m [93mphototroph[0m ([93mFAP[0m) that [93mforms[0m [93mone[0m of the [93mearliest[0m [93mbranches[0m of [93mphotosynthetic[0m [93mbacteria[0m.
